class.name: ParallaxLayer
class.brief_description: A parallax scrolling layer to be used with [ParallaxBackground].
class.description: A ParallaxLayer must be the child of a [ParallaxBackground] node. Each ParallaxLayer can be set to move at different speeds relative to the camera movement or the [member ParallaxBackground.scroll_offset] value. This node's children will be affected by its scroll offset.

method.name: get_mirroring
method.description: Return the mirroring of the ParallaxLayer.

method.name: get_motion_scale
method.description: Return the motion scale of the ParallaxLayer.

method.name: set_mirroring
method.description: Set the mirroring of the ParallaxLayer. If an axis is set to 0 then that axis will have no mirroring.

method.name: set_motion_scale
method.description: Set the motion scale of the ParallaxLayer. If an axis is set to 0 then it will not move at all, it will stick with the camera.

members.member: The ParallaxLayer's [Texture] mirroring. Useful for creating an infinite scrolling background. If an axis is set to [code]0[/code] the [Texture] will not be mirrored. Default value: [code](0, 0)[/code].
The ParallaxLayer's offset relative to the parent ParallaxBackground's [member ParallaxBackground.scroll_offset].
Multiplies the ParallaxLayer's motion. If an axis is set to [code]0[/code] it will not scroll.
